entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:11 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 03:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. Fog patches. Low zero. Forecast issued 03:09 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to periods of snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 03:09 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 03:09 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 03:09 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 03:09 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 03:09 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
